G

getCalories(ExcerciseSessionInfo) - Static method in class android.health.pedometer.ExcerciseSession
This method calculates the estimated number of calories consumed for the given exercise session data if not already calculated.
getCalories() - Method in class android.health.pedometer.ExcerciseSessionInfo
 
getCalsBurnedSince(long) - Method in class android.health.pedometer.PedometerDatabaseAdapter
This is merely a convenience method that tallies up the calories from all sessions that began after the passed point in time.
getCalsEatenSince(long) - Method in class android.health.pedometer.PedometerDatabaseAdapter
Returns all the logged calories the user has consumed since a certain time (in millis, see GregorianCalendar)
getDistance() - Method in class android.health.pedometer.DistanceChecker
Returns the latest estimate on the distance traveled by the user during this session.
getDistance() - Method in class android.health.pedometer.ExcerciseSession
Returns the currently tallied distance traveled (in meters).
getDistance() - Method in class android.health.pedometer.ExcerciseSessionInfo
Returns the current tallied distance traveled as estimated by the DistanceChecker.
getFoodMatches(String) - Method in class android.health.dietlogging.DietDatabaseAdapter
 
getFoodMatches(String) - Method in class android.health.pedometer.PedometerDatabaseAdapter
 
getMyCalories() - Method in class android.health.pedometer.ExcerciseSession
This is the recommended way of accessing the estimated number of calories burned through this exercise session.
getTotalCaloriesBurned(int) - Method in class android.health.manager.HealthCoach
This queries the exercise logs database to obtain how many calories were burned through exercise over the window specified (1 is the last 24 hours, 2 is the last 7 days, and 3 is the last 30 days)
getTotalCaloriesEaten(int) - Method in class android.health.manager.HealthCoach
This queries the logged meals database to obtain how many calories were consumed over the window specified (1 is the last 24 hours, 2 is the last 7 days, and 3 is the last 30 days)
getTravel() - Method in class android.health.pedometer.ExcerciseSessionInfo
Returns the type of travel the user indicated they were using for this exercise session.
getTypeOfTravel() - Method in class android.health.pedometer.ExcerciseSession
Returns the type of travel for this session (string form for readability)
grams_eaten - Static variable in class android.health.manager.R.id
 
grams_eaten_label - Static variable in class android.health.manager.R.id
